name: Solar System (itch) (Chris Cardimen)
description:
This was my first project in Michigan State University's CAS117 class! 

This is less of a game, and more of an interactive media piece. It's a representation of our solar system, where you can click on planets and watch them revolve around the sun! 

Credits

None of the assets are mine, nor the programming. As I mentioned above, this was the very first project in CAS117 that we did, as an introduction to interactive media and the Unity engine. However, I did put everything together in Unity for the assignment.
